Home.Success_Stories_Desc: Over the past decade, Khalifa Fund for Enterprise Development has been committed to fostering the SME landscape within the UAE. We work with key stakeholders across the region to support SME businesses at different stages of growth, giving them a platform to flourish in a sustainable manner. Think of us as a launchpad, where SMEs get funding, mentorship and several other facilities as they embark on their challenging entrepreneurship journey. Today, we are celebrating 10 years of catalysing the growth of high potential SMEs - and we want to share their beautiful stories with you. We hope you enjoy reading these 60 profiles of innovation as much as we enjoyed putting them together for you!
Home.Board_Members_Desc: Khalifa Fund for Enterprise Development has forged close partnerships with key stakeholders within the SME ecosystem since its very inception. We recognise that such associations strengthen our support infrastructure and foster cross-industry collaboration. Moreover, these partners have played a pivotal role in enhancing the competitiveness of our member businesses through their ongoing support. We are extremely grateful to these entities and would like to showcase some of their fantastic insights on this platform.
